thread.title: Harvey Weinstein 'Casting Couch' statue unveiled ahead of Oscars

title: Harvey Weinstein 'Casting Couch' statue unveiled ahead of Oscars
text:
Harvey Weinstein 'Casting Couch' statue unveiled ahead of Oscars Thursday, March 01, 2018 - 00:49 
Los Angeles-based street artist Plastic Jesus unveils a statue called ''Casting Couch,'' depicting a life-size Harvey Weinstein, wearing a bathrobe and holding an Oscar. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)
